TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit UnescapedXmlDiagnosticData extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供非转义 XML 数据以记录用户提供的跟踪数据。

span.span: Provides unescaped XML data for the logging of user-provided trace data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类由 方法使用。This class is used by the methods. 它还可用于将 XML 数据传递给 方法。It can also be used to pass XML data to the methods. > [!NOTE] > 不检查用户提供的数据的架构有效性。The user-provided data is not checked for schema validity. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 类。The following code example demonstrates how to use class. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example that is provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.EventSchemaTraceListener#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.EventSchemaTraceListener/cs/program.cs#11)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.EventSchemaTraceListener#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.EventSchemaTraceListener/vb/program.vb#11)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string xmlPayload) cil managed

param.name: xmlPayload
param.span: 要写入事件架构的 节点中的 XML 数据。

span.span: The XML data to be logged in the node of the event schema.

summary.span: 使用指定的 XML 数据字符串初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class by using the specified XML data string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果希望代码与架构端对端兼容，则 `xmlPayload` 参数必须是可以针对端到端事件架构进行验证的 XML 片段。If you want your code to be end-to-end schema-compliant, the `xmlPayload` parameter must be an XML fragment that can be validated against the end-to-end event schema. 如果 `xmlPayload` 为 `null` ，则 属性为空字符串。If `xmlPayload` is `null`, the property is an empty string. > [!NOTE] > `xmlPayload` 不检查 XML 有效性。`xmlPayload` is not checked for XML validity. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 构造函数。The following code example demonstrates how to use the constructor. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example that is provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.EventSchemaTraceListener#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.EventSchemaTraceListener/cs/program.cs#11)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.EventSchemaTraceListener#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.EventSchemaTraceListener/vb/program.vb#11)]

summary.span: 获取或设置非转义 XML 数据字符串。

span.span: Gets or sets the unescaped XML data string.

value.span: 非转义 XML 字符串。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果希望代码与架构兼容，则该 属性值必须是可以针对端到端事件架构进行验证的 XML 片段。If you want your code to be end-to-end schema-compliant, the property value must be an XML fragment that can be validated against the end-to-end event schema.
